description: Beautiful ceramic vase with hand-painted traditional motifs.

description: Mirror with carved frame featuring traditional motifs.

description: Round decorative plate with intricate traditional patterns.

description: Velvet handbag with detailed traditional embroidery.

description: Wooden jewelry holder decorated with vibrant geometric beads.

description: Square frame with colorful traditional design.

description: Set of small keychains with colorful beadwork.

title: Decorative Mirror
description: Mirror framed with traditional embroidered patterns and tassels.

title: Ceramic Vase with Palestinian Tatreez Motifs
description: A handcrafted ceramic vase decorated with patterns inspired by traditional Palestinian embroidery. A warm accent for living rooms or offices and a thoughtful heritage gift.

title: Set of Embroidery Hoops – Floral Designs
description: Wall-ready hoops featuring hand-stitched floral patterns in rich colors. Perfect for gallery walls, reading nooks, or a cozy craft corner.

title: Embroidered Bag Set
description: A main handbag with two matching accessories, finished with geometric tatreez bands. Practical for travel and daily use while showcasing cultural style.

title: Embroidered Textile – Runner/Pillow Cover
description: A soft textile piece stitched with classic Palestinian motifs—use as a small table runner or cushion cover to add warmth and texture.

title: Shoulder Bag with Red & Black Embroidery
description: A compact shoulder bag highlighted by bold geometric stitching in traditional colors. Just the right size for essentials with a heritage touch.

title: Mini Embroidered Keychains – Heritage Squares
description: A set of small, hand-embroidered keychains featuring classic square motifs. Great as thoughtful, everyday gifts for bags and keys.

title: Embroidered Hand Wallet – Geometric Panel
description: A slim hand wallet with a colorful embroidered front—ideal for bills, coins, and cards. Lightweight and easy to carry.

title: Tatreez Trim/Belt
description: A versatile embroidered band that can be used as a belt or as trim for clothing and bags. Warm tones and timeless patterns.

title: Small Tassel Handbag – Geometric Embroidery
description: A petite handbag with a side tassel and crisp geometric stitching. A stylish pick for light daily use or events.

title: Hand-Woven Frame – Watermelon Motif
description: A charming mini tapestry mounted in a wooden frame with a playful watermelon pattern. Sweet as desk décor or wall art.

title: Embroidered Zipper Pouch – Tissue/Accessory Case
description: A zip-top pouch finished with traditional embroidery. Works as a tissue cover, makeup bag, or organizer inside larger totes.

title: Set of Embroidered Coin Pouches (4pcs)
description: Four coordinated mini pouches with colorful stitching—perfect for coins, earbuds, or small gifts.

title: Multi-Color Embroidered Cover
description: A richly stitched textile panel with interlaced patterns. Use as a small runner, placemat, or framed fabric art.

title: Business/Laptop Bag with Tatreez Panel
description: A durable work bag accented by a front embroidery strip. Fits a laptop and documents while adding an elegant cultural detail.

title: Keffiyeh Scarf with Floral Embroidered Edge
description: A classic keffiyeh enhanced with a colorful floral border. Blends tradition with a fresh, modern finish—great for gifting.

title: Red Embroidered Clutch
description: An elegant clutch with rich red tatreez detailing—ideal for evenings and special occasions.
